TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderHwndOverride implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 公開方法，這種方法可在片段的使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄內重新定位以視窗為基礎的項目。

span.span: Exposes a method that enables repositioning of window-based elements within the UI Automation tree of the fragment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple GetOverrideProviderForHwnd(native int hwnd) cil managed
Public Function GetOverrideProviderForHwnd (hwnd As IntPtr) As IRawElementProviderSimple

span.span: The window handle of the element.

summary.span: 擷取指定項目的使用者介面自動化提供者。

span.span: Retrieves a UI automation provider for the specified element.

returns.span: 指定之項目的提供者，如果未覆寫項目的預設提供者，則為 null 參考 (在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中為 )。

span.span: The provider for the specified element, or a null reference ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the element's default provider is not being overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法片段根節點片段的包含視窗為基礎的子項目時，這些子元素的 Hwnd 不以邏輯方式定位在用戶端使用者介面自動化提供者所實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中。This method is implemented by client-side UI Automation providers for fragment roots in fragments that contain window-based child elements, when the HWNDs of those child elements are not logically positioned within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱非 WPF 提供者重設父代與非 WPF 提供者重新定位在[伺服器端 UI 自動化提供者實作](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/server-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md)主題。For more information, see Non-WPF Provider Reparenting and Non-WPF Provider Repositioning in the [Server-Side UI Automation Provider Implementation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/server-side-ui-automation-provider-implementation.md) topic. 傳回提供者必須是片段樹狀結構的一部分。The returned provider must be part of the fragment tree. 它可以提供額外的屬性，或覆寫指定元件的屬性。It can supply additional properties or override properties of the specified component. 如果傳回的提供者實作，提供者應該片段的樹狀結構的一部分而且可巡覽的片段根。If the returned provider implements , the provider should be part of the fragment's tree and be reachable by navigating from the fragment's root.
